thread.title: Which Super Bowl matchup would be the most interesting?
thread.title_full: Which Super Bowl matchup would be the most interesting?

author: Mike Florio
title: Which Super Bowl matchup would be the most interesting?
text:
Which Super Bowl matchup would be the most interesting? Posted by Mike Florio on January 16, 2017, 11:28 PM EST Getty Images 
With four teams left, there are four possible Super Bowl matchups. So which one would be the best? 
That’s, coincidentally, the PFT Live question of the day for Tuesday. 
Answer below, drop a comment, etc., etc., etc. 
Guests include Tom Curran of CSN New England and John McClain of the Houston Chronicle. 
Join us at 6:00 a.m. ET on NBC Sports Radio, with the simulcast starting at 7:00 a.m. ET on NBCSN. See you then. Share this:
